service: SageMaker Edge Manager dataplane service for communicating with active agents.

operations.GetDeviceRegistration: Use to check if a device is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.
operations.SendHeartbeat: Use to get the current status of devices registered on SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationResult$CacheTTL: The amount of time, in seconds, that the registration status is stored on the deviceâ€™s cache before it is refreshed.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationRequest$DeviceFleet: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.
refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$DeviceFleetName: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationRequest$DeviceName: The unique name of the device you want to get the registration status from.

refs.GetDeviceRegistrationResult$DeviceRegist: Describes if the device is currently registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$AgentMetrics: For internal use. Returns a list of SageMaker Edge Manager agent operating metrics.

InternalServiceException.base: An internal failure occurred. Try your request again. If the problem persists, contact AWS customer support.

Model.base: Information about a model deployed on an edge device that is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

refs.SendHeartbeatRequest$Models: Returns a list of models deployed on the the device.

refs.EdgeMetric$Timestamp: Timestamp of when the metric was requested.
refs.Model$LatestSampleTime: The timestamp of the last data sample taken.
refs.Model$LatestInference: The timestamp of the last inference that was made.
